house_listing.house_description: Lovely transitional ranch w/brick front on the lake. Home has been well cared for & shows nicely. Big fenced yard on the lake. Grt rm has vaulted ceilings, lg eat-in area & pass thru to fam room. Close to pool & tennis courts. Nice dog on premises but must make appt.Garage modified but can go back!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Club House, Fenced, Ranch Style, Tennis Court(s)
